post.file:
#!/bin/sh
metaserver=""
if [ $metaserver == 'localhost' ]; then echo "update app_globals set Value='' where Component='GfarmMetaserver' and Value='localhost'" | mysql -u apache cluster
INTERACTIVE=false /sbin/runuser postgres -c '/bin/rm -f $HOME/.ssh/id_rsa.pub' INTERACTIVE=false /sbin/runuser postgres -c 'ssh-keygen -t rsa -N "" -f $HOME/.ssh/id_rsa.pub'
config-gfarm -b postgresql > /dev/null
/opt/rocks/sbin/add-new-appliance --appliance-name gfarm \ --xml-config-file-name gfarm-data \ --short-name gf else rpm -el gfarm-server fi
rm /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-50-gfarm-server
